nodes.bodyText: I wonder if it should be a property of the NetworkIndex (Network.setEnsureAliasUnicity) that can be set globally.
I followed the same logic than setEnsureIdUnicity but that can be a good idea for both!
I just came back to your comment, you seem to say it should not be set alias by alias but globally. I agree with you but do you think it should be the same for unique IDs?
This could be considered as a breaking change because the default behaviour is not the same anymore
I don't think it changes the default behaviour, before my change, this method behaved as if unicity was not ensured: an exception was thrown when an already existing alias was passed
In my memories, you looked different :)

nodes.bodyText: I only moved this file, I didn't create it, this is why I didn't change the author!
